content: Write a Python script that utilizes the matplotlib library to plot a sine wave and cosine wave on the same graph, with different colors and labels for each curve. PLAINFORMAT

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Generate data points
x = np.linspace(0, 2 * np.pi, 100)
y_sin = np.sin(x)
y_cos = np.cos(x)

# Plot sine wave
plt.plot(x, y_sin, label='Sine Wave', color='blue')

# Plot cosine wave
plt.plot(x, y_cos, label='Cosine Wave', color='red')

# Add labels and title
plt.xlabel('Angle (radians)')
plt.ylabel('Amplitude')
plt.title('Sine and Cosine Waves')

# Add legend
plt.legend()

# Display the plot
plt.show()
